mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_NO, RECEIVER, SENDER, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_TITLE, READ_CHECK, MESSAGE_DATE) VALUES (MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{receiver}, #{sender}, #{messageContent}, #{messageTitle}, #{readCheck}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_NO, RECEIVER, SENDER, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_TITLE, READ_CHECK, MESSAGE_DATE FROM MESSAGE WHERE RECEIVER = #{receiver} ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC
